attributes.action: develop a policy to tackle the growing threat of radicalised vampires, werewolves, zombies, trolls and dragons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned urge the prime minister to develop a policy to tackle the growing threat poised by radicalised supernatural beings. The beings have been villanously portrayed in today's media despite, playing a vital role in our community by making sure kids go to sleep, eat thier greens etc. They are becoming a serious threat with their supernatural powers and may launch an attack.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
